Welcome to Davin Pearson's

GNU Java Training Wheels Manual

Java Training wheels is a pre-processor for the Java language, adding such features as a superfor macro, file inclusion, begin ... end instead of { .. } and new keywords function, method, property, constructor, classVar, var, then, elseif, and and or.
  • The manual in info format
  • The manual in H.T.M.L. format
